trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Colton
There were no other sightings in Colton on or around September 25th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsThis Ufo seems to be circling around two cities, yucaipa and colton. It also is flying over colton and rialto and semi high speeds. We have multiple witnesses on facebook, and on the phone that are confirming site of strange lights in the sky consisting of lights going back and forth. We continue to see it fly nearby over neighborhood, but it continues to circle more out near redlands and Yucaipa cities. Bizarre Behaviors although may indicate human direction. We are near the close Norton Air force base. I was currently enjoying time with my family when this happened. Noticed object only because lights moved in strange format. Thoughts were originally of some human flown object however lights seemed bizarre and continued.
Summary: Object seems to have lights that go around it back and forth, illusion of saucer like flying. Moving Back and forth and erratic movements unlike normal plane or helicopter sight. Confirmed by 5 witnesses
